pnpm install
cd game-node && npm run build && cd .. && npm link game-node
npm install @virtuals-protocol/game
npx hardhat console --network datil-dev
cd game-node && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network datil
cd game-node && npx hardhat run scripts/test-tstlpx.ts --network chronicle
rm -rf scripts/
const [deployer] = await ethers.getSigners(); console.log(await deployer.getBalance());
npx hardhat --version
curl -X POST --data '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_blockNumber","params":[],"id":1}' -H "Content-Type: application/json" https://alien-flashy-spree.ethereum-holesky.quiknode.pro/56e9cb1c62ba51c4120c8c75e20f1c649726432d
npx hardhat console --network chronicle
npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network chronicle
